document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2016-04
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING THE MUNICIPAL CODE CHAPTER 18.44 TO UPDATE THE PARK DEDICATION STANDARD PERSON PER DWELLING UNIT FACTOR TO REFLECT THE CURRENT US CENSUS ESTIMATE, AMEND THE ORDINANCE WITH TECHNICAL CORRECTIONS THAT IMPROVE CLARITY AND REMOVE ARCHAIC LANGUAGE, AND ENABLE THE CITY COUNCIL DISCRETION TO REQUIRE PARKLAND AND RECREATIONAL FACILITY CONSTRUCTION TIMING TO BE DECIDED IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TENTATIVE MAP APPROVAL PROCESS
